channel.title: How to block those anoyying ads
channel.description:
[b][size=15pt]First:[/size][/b] download firefox from here http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/
[b][size=15pt]then you download this ad-on[/size][/b] https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1865
then right click what you want to block and choose adblock image
(note: if you want to block ads from a specific site like those annoying google ads and those myspace ads then take off most of that end part and it should look somewhat like this: http://advert.runescape.com/banner.ws http://x.myspace.com/images/advertisement http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead)
(note: this also works on runescape)

item.title: How to block those anoyying ads
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

Yoshi0308:

Don’t you get banned for blocking Jagex’s ads?

Wow…just wow…

Read full topic

item.title: How to block those anoyying ads
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“Yoshi0308, post:5, topic:149708”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=205103.msg1807391#msg1807391 date=1191744976]

Don’t you get banned for blocking Jagex’s ads?

how would they even find out? also, you don’t have to if you don’t want to.
[/quote]

Don’t know, I thought I’ve read a rule about it or something.[/quote]
there is a rule, but i don’t think they know how to find out if your doing it, and they jsut made a rule hopefully scaring the people that actually KNOW how to do it.

Read full topic

@dragonus18 wrote:

[size=15pt]First:[/size] download firefox from here http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/

[size=15pt]then you download this ad-on[/size] https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1865

then right click what you want to block and choose adblock image

(note: if you want to block ads from a specific site like those annoying google ads and those myspace ads then take off most of that end part and it should look somewhat like this: http://advert.runescape.com/banner.ws http://x.myspace.com/images/advertisement http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead)

(note: this also works on runescape)
